title: Zen Cart
description: Once installed in Zen Cart, this plugin will show your DHL Express through OptimalShip rates in your online store.
subtitle: Steps to Configurate Zen Cart Account

list.title: Download the latest version of the Zen Cart plugin (version 1.0.1). Click here to download: optimalship-1.0.1.zip

Extract the contents of the zip and move the files into their respective locations in your store's installation files. The file path should match the zip file from your site's root folder. There are two files to add: one to root\includes\modules\shipping\ and the other to root\includes\languages\english\modules\shipping\.
From your store's admin page, go to Modules and select Shipping

image.alt: From your store's admin page, go to Modules and select Shipping

list.title: Find the module named DHL Express with Optimalship under Shipping Modules. If necessary, click Install Module
Once the module is installed, edit the settings as needed:

unorderedList: Enable DHL Express Shipping: Select True to enable DHL Express rates in your store's shopping cart.
OptimalShip Account Number: Enter your account number provided by OptimalShip.
Shipping Surcharge: Add a flat fee to your shipping rates for your clients. Enter '0.00' for no fee.
Shipping Zone: Select shipping zones where to display DHL Express shipping rates.
Sort Order: Adjust number to order DHL Express against other shipping methods offered.
content.title: Click Update to save configuration.

list.title: DHL Express with OptimalShip will now appear as a shipping option for international shipments

image.alt: DHL Express with OptimalShip will now appear as a shipping option
